mapper.select: select t.* from t_race_team t where 1=1 and name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' ) and contact like CONCAT('%','${contact}','%' ) and mobile=#{mobile} and descs=#{descs} and isTeam=#{isTeam} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_race_team where 1=1 and name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' ) and contact like CONCAT('%','${contact}','%' ) and mobile=#{mobile} and descs=#{descs} and isTeam=#{isTeam}
mapper.insert: insert into t_race_team ( id ,name ,contact ,mobile ,descs ,isTeam ) values( id ,#{name} ,#{contact} ,#{mobile} ,#{descs} ,#{isTeam} )
mapper.update: update t_race_team set id=#{id} ,name=#{name} ,contact=#{contact} ,mobile=#{mobile} ,descs=#{descs} ,isTeam=#{isTeam} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.* from t_race_team t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' ) and contact like CONCAT('%','${contact}','%' ) and mobile=#{mobile} and descs=#{descs} and isTeam=#{isTeam}

SELECT tm.id, tm.name, tm.contact, tm.mobile, t.name AS rName, t.isTeam AS isTeam, a.createTime as time, (SELECT rs.score FROM t_race_score rs WHERE rs.addonId=tm.id) AS score, (SELECT rs.rank FROM t_race_score rs WHERE rs.addonId=tm.id) AS rank, (SELECT rs.id FROM t_race_score rs WHERE rs.addonId=tm.id) AS sId, (SELECT COUNT(m.id) FROM t_race_addon_man m WHERE m.teamId=a.teamId) AS num FROM t_race_team tm, t_race_addon a, t_race_info t WHERE 1=1 AND a.raceId=t.id AND a.teamId=tm.id AND t.id=#{id}
select t.* from t_race_team t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select t.* from t_race_team t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_race_team where 1=1 and id=#{id}
